title: The WQED cuts will eliminate FM local flavor
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Opinion - Today 
I write with mixed emotions in response to your Sept. 28 editorial “WQED’s Cuts: The Station Made Some Painful Choices to Survive.”...
